You'll want to make sure your resolv.conf is clean then. If there's a "search" line at the top of it I'd recomend removing that and seeing if that fixes it. If you need some good hard DNS servers to try, I use 4.2.2.1 and 4.2.2.2
They'll need to be on a line that starts with "nameserver "
